TopicTitle: KSP launches,crashes before gameplay can begin

Articles.Content:
Having an issue where I can launch KSP and go through the initial settings for gameplay (setting up career mode, choosing flag), but then when I attempt to start it crashes on load.

Running OS X El Capitan 10.11.1 and KSP 1.0.4 (build id = 00861)

Crashlog: https://www.dropbox.com/s/gmjye1e6r4kijbs/Player.log?dl=0

System Specs (.spx): https://www.dropbox.com/s/g8rfts2w7atohvn/System%20Specs.spx?dl=0

System Specs (.rtf): https://www.dropbox.com/s/blfplxnnt3vojxe/System%20Specs.rtf?dl=0

Let me know if there's any other info I can help provide.

Hi mickdc, it looks like your fonts are corrupted.

Receiving unhandled NULL exception

Obtained 16 stack frames.

#0 0x007fff991ded32 in strlen

#1 0x0000010028ad07 in GetFontMetadata(std::string const&, std::string&, std::string&, unsigned int&, unsigned int&, int, int*)

#2 0x0000010028af17 in ReadFontFiles()

#3 0x0000010028b3fe in DynamicFontData::GetFaceForFontRef(FontRef&, std::vector<PPtr<Font>,

There's many more lines like these in the log, so please try clearing your font cache.

Here's one way, and many others can be found via an internet search
